title: Large one bedroom apartments, Bad Credit Ok, Close to shopping
posting_body: ['MLK Apartments in Las Vegas', 'Low Weekly & Monthly Rates', 'FREE Utilities', 'Free Premium Cable TV', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Additional Information:', '<URL>', 'Apartment Home Features', '-Free premium cable TV', '-Siegel Rewards Program', '-High-speed wireless internet available', '-Easy freeway access', '-Close to shopping', '-Large loft apartments', '-Basketball Court', '-Unfurnished apartments', '-Free utilities included with apartment', '-No long term lease required', '-Large studio apartments', '-Large two bedroom apartments', 'Free Siegel Reward Program', 'Earn points every time you pay your rent or refer a friend.', 'Use your points to treat yourself to', 'free rent, food, movies, gift cards', ', and much more!', 'Pet Policy', '20lb weight limit and aggressive breeds such as Pit Bulls and Rottweilers are prohibited.', 'Managed by The Siegel Group', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Pricing may include current special and is subject to change without notice.']
